title: Ticket #7187: Add tests for queue_with_itemdata
description:
In #7064, we accidentally introduced a regression in Submit.queue_with_itemdata where itemdata could not longer be None.

There should be regression tests for this method, including call signatures like 

sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn)
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1)
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, None)
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, iter([{}]))
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, iter(sub.itemdata()))
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, iter(sub.itemdata("matching *.dat")))

After the patch to make iter() optional, these should also work 

sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, [])
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, [{}])
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, [1,7])
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, [ {a:1,b:2}, [4,8], [5,10] ])

and these cases should not crash, and have reasonable errors 

sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, {})
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, {[]})
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, 7)
sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 1, "seven")

i.e., all the basic weird edge cases of what you can pass as the itemdata.
remarks:
2019-Sep-13 11:27:04 by tlmiller:
Follows the test I was using. It is not sufficient for this not to crash (and you can probably reduce the loop to 100, based on my testing, but not below that), but you need to investigate the resulting jobs and make sure 'component' is set correctly.

When testing just the first to submits, I used condor_q -af component | sort | uniq -c to help with that task. 

#!/usr/bin/python3
import gc
import htmap
import htcondor

descriptors = {
    'JobBatchName': 'deep-super-echo',
    'log': '/tmp/events',
    'submit_event_notes': '$(component)',
    'stdout': '/tmp/$(component).stdout',
    'stderr': '/tmp/$(component).stderr',
    'should_transfer_files': 'YES',
    'when_to_transfer_output': 'ON_EXIT_OR_EVICT',
    'transfer_output_files': '_htmap_transfer/,_htmap_user_transfer/$(component)',
    'transfer_output_remaps': '"$(component).out=/tmp/$(component).out"',
    'on_exit_hold': 'ExitCode =!= 0',
    'initialdir': '/tmp',
    '+component': '$(component)',
    '+IsHTMapJob': 'True',
    'universe': 'vanilla',
    'executable': '/bin/sleep',
    'arguments': '$(component)',
    'request_memory': '128MB',
    'request_disk': '100MB',
    'transfer_input_files': '/tmp/func,/tmp/$(component).in,$(extra_input_files)'
}
itemdata = [{'component': str(idx)} for idx in range(10)]
schedd = htcondor.Schedd()

for i in range(1000):
    sub = htcondor.Submit(descriptors)
    with schedd.transaction() as txn:
        submit_result = sub.queue_with_itemdata( txn, 1, iter(itemdata) )
        submit_result = sub.queue_with_itemdata( txn, 1, itemdata )
        submit_result = sub.queue_with_itemdata( txn, 1, None )
        submit_result = sub.queue_with_itemdata( txn, 1, 7 )
        submit_result = sub.queue_with_itemdata( txn, 1, "seven" )
        submit_result = sub.queue_with_itemdata( txn, 1, descriptors )
        print( i )

print("OK")
